description: Fido likes to be walked twice a day 15 minutes at a time, though take out for bathroom breaks every 2-4 hours. Leash will be provided. He has some separation anxiety so can't be left by himself.

Mittens can be left alone between his meals from 9 am to 3pm, and between 4 pm to 9:30 pm. He does need a little more attention in the evenings when I have more time to play with him at night. He is on a special diet and oral medications. All cat supplies provided.

Spot is a rescue but super sweet and a cuddle bug. She's quiet and well-behaved but can't be around other dogs, though will warm up to you after inital nervousness wears off. She requires 10-15 minute walks 4 times a day every 3-5 hours (unless sleeping). She is reactive on leash around other dogs so avoid busy streets and dogs on walks.
Nico likes to be walked twice a day 15 minutes at a time, though take out for bathroom breaks every 2-4 hours. Leash will be provided. He has some separation anxiety so can't be left by himself.
